itscydneyrai: It’s funny because my love’s name is Jonathan too and he appeared in my life when I was doing me while I was talking to someone else who saw no future in us. I was not interested and he changed my mind without trying. I had a conversation with the nowhere land man about how I wanted to give this guy a shot and he said “go for it. He’s there and I’m not”, the rest is history. Our love isn’t perfect and tidy, but what great love story is?! Jonathan has never once tried to dim my shine or tame my passion. He’s never made me feel like the fullness of who I am is too much. He has embraced the good, the bad, and the ugly and made me a better woman by simply loving me. He allows me to do me, and he even helps me do it better, and I do the same for him. Who said you can’t take action towards your dreams and have an epic, long-lasting love?
